name: MicrobeVania
description:
MicrobeVania!  Explore your host as The Pathogen and find your way to your host's brain.  Discover a new ability that will let you venture farther!  This game is still in development, but I would still like feedback and tips on what you think would make it better!

Controls

Move:WASD

Aim: Mouse

Attack: Left Click

Dash: Right Click

pause: Escape
